articles.content:
DPRK places first at football tournament in Thailand 
    Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- DPRK footballers took the first place at the football tournament for Thai Crown Cup held in Thailand.
 At the tournament, which brought together footballers from Asian countries, the DPRK team defeated the Singaporean team 4:2 on Feb. 12.    
 At the finals on Feb. 16, the DPRK team defeated the Thai team by 4:3.

Kim Jong Il's biography printed in Brazil 
    Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's biography was printed by the October 8 Revolutionary Movement of Brazil on the occasion of his birthday.
